name: Lycanroc Midnight

ability.name: Lone Wolf
ability.effect: While there are no Pokemon on your bench, Lycanroc Midnight deals 30 more damage with attacks.

attacks.name: Scary Face
attacks.effect: If the Defending Pokemon's retreat cost is 1 or less, switch the Defending Pokemon with a Pokemon on the opponent's bench.

flavor: When Rockruff is abandoned and forced to fend for itself, it becomes The Joker.
